item.title: Taiwan holds steady in massive earthquake; Discontented voters show up in Wisconsin
item.description: Taiwan holds steady after a massive earthquake shakes the region. Biden and Trump won their Wisconsin primaries, but discontented voters made their voices heard.

item.title: Lou Conter, last survivor of the USS Arizona in Pearl Harbor, dies at 102
item.description: The seaman had a storied career in the Navy. Over 27 years he served, he survived the surprise attack by Japan, was shot down over the Pacific and was uninjured in the Korean War.

item.title: April nor'easter could unload more than a foot of snow on much of New England
item.description: New Englanders are bracing for high winds, treacherous roads and power outages. Southern New England and the coastline will get mostly rain, and maybe a few inches of snow.

item.title: Ivan Fedotov was drafted by the Flyers 9 years ago. He just debuted this week
item.description: Philadelphia signed Fedotov in May 2022. But when Fedotov tried to leave Russia for the NHL, he was detained on allegations of avoiding his duty to serve in the military and was forced to enlist.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: It's time to stop downsizing health care, the Pentagon says. This couple can't wait
item.description: After a decade of outsourcing military health care, the Pentagon now plans to do the opposite, an about-face Matt and Helen Perry hope means they'll get the care they were promised after going to war.

item.description: Florida is at the center of the fight over abortion. As the state faces new restrictions and a November ballot question on abortion rights, Democrats see potential where they haven't in years.

item.title: Deadly severe weather roars through several states, spawning potential tornadoes
item.description: Parts of Ohio, Pennsylvania, Kentucky, Mississippi, Alabama, Tennessee, West Virginia, Virginia and Georgia were under tornado watches, while Wisconsin was experiencing a spring snowstorm.

item.title: Amazon says it is removing Just Walk Out technology from its Fresh grocery stores
item.description: Amazon says the technology will now be replaced by smart carts that allow customers to skip the checkout line but also see their spending in real time.

item.title: Bird flu has been detected at the largest chicken egg manufacturer in the U.S.
item.description: Cal-Maine Foods lost about 1.9 million chickens, or 3.6% of its flock, as a result of an outbreak at a Texas plant. However, the CDC says a person is unlikely to get bird flu from eggs.
